author: SAILORMAN6
title: Top Class near Times Square - Review
text:
Easy check in on arrival. very fast easy to use lifts. Room clean and well presented. Safe, microwave and hot water heater for drinks. Room serviced all but one day, not hotel fault over a foot of snow during the night and snowed most of next day, staff unable to get in. Excellent service all other days. Reception staff very helpful. Superb location for Times square , Broadway and theatres .
Room Tip: lifts don't work in a fire situation so if you are a bit infirm request lower room. See more room tips
